title: Human Nature: Justice versus Power Noam Chomsky debates with Michel Foucault 1971
description:
In 1971, Michel Foucault had a famous debate on Dutch television with Noam Chomsky on justice, power, politics and human nature.
A part of this dabate with spanish subtitles

full transcription of the debate (in english):
